projectName: Madison Square Garden Sphere Entertainment Co.
shortDescription: Live entertainment and media company creating immersive and interactive experiences for the Sphere in Las Vegas.
longDescription: I was a Software Engineering Student Associate on the Simulation and Visualizations (SimVis) team, where I worked on software products and tools used internally for content production at the Sphere and other Madison Square Garden properties. As a Software Engineering Student Associate, I...
resumeBullets: Worked on a multiuser Virtual Reality and Desktop application used by creatives at Sphere Entertainment for venue simulation and simulataneous media playback and reviewing.
Designed and developed a new user feature that enabled moveable user interface panels using a modular architecture solution, using Agile methodologies.
Enhanced an in-built debug panel used by developers, tackling and resolving bugs and optimizing the build testing pipeline.
